# Monumento a la Madre, Guadalajara

| mapframe           = yes

The  () is installed in Guadalajara, in the Mexican state of Jalisco. It features an indigenous woman looking at the sky while she covers her child. It is a bronze statue that lies on a volcanic rock base. It lies along Plaza 10 de Mayo and it was inaugurated in 1956.
See also
*Monumento a la Madre, Mexico City
